mapper.insert: insert into PaymentRequest(id, referenceIDList, status, channel, createTime, lastUpdateTime, requestedAmount, paymentMethod, customerID, paymentOperationType, callBackMetaInfo, business) values (#{id}, #{referenceIDList}, #{status}, #{channel}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{requestedAmount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{customerID}, #{paymentOperationType}, #{callBackMetaInfo}, #{business})
mapper.update: update PaymentRequest set status = #{status}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime} where id = #{id}
